description: This file defines middleware for centralized error handling in an ASP.NET Core application. It captures exceptions during request processing, logs them, and returns a standardized JSON error response. It also includes an extension method to register this middleware in the application pipeline.

classes.name: ErrorHandlingMiddleware
classes.description: Middleware for catching exceptions during HTTP request processing, logging errors, and returning JSON error responses.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Handles the request, catching exceptions, logging errors, and writing JSON error responses.

methods.name: WriteErrorAsync
methods.description: Serializes and writes a JSON error message to the HTTP response.
